[{"name":"MONO","type":"int","description":"Represents a monospaced font, used for code or other situations where itâ€™s important that the characters are all the same width for alignment.

"},{"name":"SANS","type":"int","description":"Represents a sans-serif font, which has no lines or strokes attached to the end of larger strokes in a letter.

"},{"name":"SERIF","type":"int","description":"Represents a serif font, which has small lines or strokes attached to the end of larger strokes in a letter.

name: Font
